intro: I finally made it to this dungeon.
According to my friend's message, there may be an Arcamun in it!
Well, there's no time, I'll go alone.
I have to get this treasure to save everyone.

good: That harpy was a most dangerous opponent.
And all the others I had to fight could have killed me.
And all the hardship was worth it, because I have Arcamun!
And now I can save everyone.
I'm tired for today, I'm going to lie down.
bad: I sent a letter that Arcamun is probably here.
I hope he has better luck than me.

pre: A lot of people who come in here don't come back.
Well, I can find a lot of useful things on earth if I look.
Basically I can try to find a way out and rush past him.
But then I'd miss the opportunity to find a useful weapon.
Okay, I'll decide during the fight.
post: Ughhhh... There really might be a treasure here.
Otherwise, the skeleton wouldn't have come to life to protect it.

pre: These columns have been here a long time. But who lit them?
Oh, a goblin, of course. There's always one in a place like this.
He'll be harder to fight than a skeleton puppet.
post: And because they're greedy, they'll do anything.
I could have died because of him!
Well, okey. Now I'm ready to go all the way.

pre: This is the deepest part of the dungeon.
It's hard for me to see or breathe.
But I feel like that's not the problem.
I can't just run away like that!
post: I can't believe it myself, but...
